message: Let's be fair and split the money, Bob. This offer is a good deal for both of us!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you, Alice?
Bob, this offer is still generous considering the inflation. It's better to take a sure deal now than risk losing more!
Come on, Alice! The money is losing value fast. This is a good deal for both of us!
Bob, this is my final offer.  Let's be reasonable and end this before inflation eats away at the value any further.
